bool WarheadTypeExt::WarheadTypeExt::ExtData::applyPermaMC ( CoordStruct *  coords,
HouseClass *  Owner,
ObjectClass *  Target 
)

This function checks if the passed warhead has MindControl.Permanent set, and, if so, applies the effect.

Note:
Moved here from hook BulletClass_Fire.
Parameters:
coords The coordinates of the warhead impact, the center of the Mind Control animation.
Owner Owner of the Mind Control effect, i.e. the one controlling the target afterwards.
Target Target of the Mind Control effect, i.e. the one being controlled by the owner afterwards.
Returns:
false if effect wasn't applied, true if it was. This is important for the chain of damage effects, as, in case of true, the target is now a friendly unit. 
00184                                                                                                     {
00185         if (this->MindControl_Permanent && Target) {
00186                 if (TechnoClass *pTarget = generic_cast<TechnoClass *>(Target)) {
00187                         TechnoTypeClass *pType = pTarget->GetTechnoType();
00188 
00189                         if (!pType || pType->ImmuneToPsionics) {
00190                                 return false; // should return 0 in hook
00191                         }
00192                         if (pTarget->MindControlledBy) {
00193                                 pTarget->MindControlledBy->CaptureManager->FreeUnit(pTarget);
00194                         }
00195                         pTarget->SetOwningHouse(Owner, 1);
00196                         pTarget->MindControlledByAUnit = 1;
00197                         pTarget->QueueMission(mission_Guard, 0);
00198 
00199                         CoordStruct XYZ = *coords;
00200                         XYZ.Z += pType->MindControlRingOffset;
00201 
00202                         AnimClass *MCAnim;
00203                         GAME_ALLOC(AnimClass, MCAnim, RulesClass::Instance->PermaControlledAnimationType, &XYZ);
00204                         AnimClass *oldMC = pTarget->MindControlRingAnim;
00205                         if (oldMC) {
00206                                 oldMC->UnInit();
00207                         }
00208                         pTarget->MindControlRingAnim = MCAnim;
00209                         MCAnim->SetOwnerObject(pTarget);
00210                         return true; // should return 0x469AA4 in hook
00211                 }
00212         }
00213         return false;
00214 }

CCINIClass *  pINI 
) [virtual] 

00035 {
00036         const char * section = pThis->ID;
00037 
00038         INI_EX exINI(pINI);
00039 
00040         if(!pINI->GetSection(section)) {
00041                 return;
00042         }
00043 
00044         // writing custom verses parser just because
00045         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Verses", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00046                 int idx = 0;
00047                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00048                         this->Verses[idx].Parse(cur);
00049                         ++idx;
00050                         if(idx > 10) {
00051                                 break;
00052                         }
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 
00056         ArmorType::LoadForWarhead(pINI, pThis);
00057 
00058         if(pThis->MindControl) {
00059                 this->MindControl_Permanent = pINI->ReadBool(section, "MindControl.Permanent", this->MindControl_Permanent);
00060         }
00061 
00062         this->EMP_Duration = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "EMP.Duration", this->EMP_Duration);
00063         this->EMP_Cap = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "EMP.Cap", this->EMP_Cap);
00064 
00065         this->IC_Duration = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "IronCurtain.Duration", this->IC_Duration);
00066 
00067         if(pThis->Temporal) {
00068                 this->Temporal_WarpAway.Parse(&exINI, section, "Temporal.WarpAway");
00069         }
00070 
00071         this->DeployedDamage = pINI->ReadDouble(section, "Damage.Deployed", this->DeployedDamage);
00072 
00073         this->Ripple_Radius = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Ripple.Radius", this->Ripple_Radius);
00074 
00075         this->AffectsEnemies = pINI->ReadBool(section, "AffectsEnemies", this->AffectsEnemies);
00076 
00077         this->InfDeathAnim.Parse(&exINI, section, "InfDeathAnim");
00078 };
